name: armband
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a piece of material that a person wears around the arm as a sign of something, for example an official position: All the stewards at the racetrack were wearing armbands. black armbands for a funeral
OnickzArtworks/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C usually plural ] UK (US waterwings) a hollow, ring-shaped piece of plastic filled with air, that people who are learning to swim wear on their arms in water to help them float
Floortje/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
